findings.title: Predictable Results For Dice Rolling
findings.description: Admin can predict dice rolling results, making the game unfair.

findings.title: Logic Error For MaxExposure Limit Check
findings.description: Missing multiplication of 5 for betAmount in maxExposureRatio check.

findings.title: Improved Validation Of manualStartRound()
findings.description: Lack of validation of Player's time not ended in manualStartRound().

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: Privileged Admin account is not governed by a DAO-like structure.

findings.title: Possible Sandwich/MEV Attacks For Reduced Return
findings.description: Vulnerable to front-running attacks resulting in a smaller gain for this round of yielding.

findings.title: Timely massUpdatePools During Pool Weight Changes
findings.description: Need to timely invoke `massUpdatePools()` when any poolâ€™s weight has been updated.

findings.title: Duplicate Pool/Bonus Detection and Prevention
findings.description: Lack of necessary sanity checks in preventing a new pool but with a duplicate token from being added.

findings.title: Incompatibility with Deflationary Tokens
findings.description: The MasterChef contract's asset-transferring routines may introduce unexpected balance inconsistencies when interacting with deflationary ERC20 tokens, affecting the pool's reward calculation.
findings.location: MasterChef contract, deposit() and withdraw() functions

findings.title: Suggested Event Generation For setAdmin()
findings.description: Lack of emitting an event to reflect adminAddress changes and playerTimeBlocks changes.
